entities.name: PrecisionCitationService
observations: Advanced legal research service with academic/peer-reviewed source prioritization
Implements structured filtering to exclude Wikipedia and low-quality sources
Uses citation count and Q-score weighting for source quality assessment
Supports multiple research workflows: background research, claim substantiation, fact verification

entities.name: BackgroundResearchIntegration
observations: Integrates precision citation service with Phase A01 intake processing
Performs background research using intake form data and existing evidence
Limits results to 3-4 most relevant sources per search
Automatically stores research results in evidence table and links to claims/facts

entities.name: ClaimSubstantiationIntegration
observations: Integrates precision citation service with Phase B01 review process
Performs claim substantiation research against legal claims
Uses academic sources for legal analysis and news sources for recent developments
Calculates substantiation strength and generates recommendations

entities.name: FactVerificationIntegration
observations: Integrates precision citation service with Phase C01 editing process
Performs fact verification research for document editing phase
Focuses on recent news and academic sources for fact corroboration
Calculates verification confidence and provides editing recommendations

entities.name: QualityMetrics
observations: Comprehensive source quality assessment system
Includes authority score, citation count weighting, Q-score weighting, recency score
Combines metrics into overall quality score (1.0-5.0 scale)
Used for filtering and ranking research sources

entities.name: LaunchScript
observations: Enhanced Bash launch script (v1.0.0) for complete LawyerFactory system startup
Handles dependency installation, environment setup, port management, health checks
Supports dry-run mode, verbose logging, configurable ports, skip-deps option

entities.name: EnvironmentSetup
observations: Auto-creates .env configuration from template if missing
Sets up directory structure: logs, data/storage, data/vectors, uploads, output
Configures Python environment detection and validates version compatibility

entities.name: ServerOrchestration
observations: Manages Flask backend server startup with Socket.IO support
Launches frontend HTTP server for static file serving
Implements health checks, PID tracking, graceful shutdown handling
Fixed eventlet/greenlet threading compatibility issue
Resolved import path conflicts and type mismatches

entities.name: EnhancedUnifiedStorageAPI
observations: Enhanced unified storage system with blob storage integration
Supports three-tier storage: S3 Raw → Evidence Table → Vector Store
Tracks ObjectIDs across all storage tiers
Fixed logger definition order issue
Consolidated duplicate files to canonical core location
Merged blob store features into canonical unified_storage_api.py
Removed duplicate enhanced files
Updated import paths in enhanced_generator.py

entities.name: ImportPathResolution
observations: Resolved import errors in enhanced_generator.py and shotlist.py
Fixed relative vs absolute import path conflicts
Corrected type mismatches in evidence ingestion modules
Ensured canonical file structure compliance
Updated import paths after consolidation of enhanced files

entities.name: CommandLineArgumentParser
observations: Added argparse support to server.py for --host and --port parameters
Fixed launch script integration by enabling proper argument passing
Resolved port configuration mismatch between launch script and server
Enabled dynamic port assignment and host binding

entities.name: SovietControlPanelUI
observations: 1950s Soviet control board inspired React UI for LawyerFactory
3-panel fixed-width layout optimized for 1920x1080
Industrial aesthetic with metal panels, analog gauges, toggle switches
Located at apps/ui/templates/soviet_control_panel.html

entities.name: SovietDesignSystem
observations: Complete design system with Soviet/industrial aesthetic
Color palette: crimson, amber, steel gray, dark green
Typography: OCR A Extended, Share Tech Mono, Russo One
Includes animations: gauge needles, button press, LED pulse

entities.name: ThreePanelLayout
observations: Fixed-width panels: 400px left, flex center, 600px right
Collapsible side panels with F1/F3 keyboard shortcuts
Responsive center panel expands when sides collapse
Optimized for 1920x1080 desktop resolution

entities.name: AnalogGaugeComponent
observations: Analog-style gauge with rotating needle indicator
Displays progress/metrics with 0-100 scale
Red danger zone for high values, tick marks
CSS transform animations for smooth needle movement

entities.name: ToggleSwitchComponent
observations: Industrial toggle switch with LED status light
Mechanical flip animation on state change
LED pulses when active, dark when inactive
Metallic finish with 3D pressed effect

entities.name: NixieDisplayComponent
observations: Nixie tube-style numeric display
Orange glow effect with subtle flicker
Displays metrics and counts
Retro vacuum tube aesthetic

entities.name: MetalPanelComponent
observations: Embossed metal panel container with rivets
Brushed steel gradient background
Decorative hex rivets in corners
Industrial warning stripes on headers

entities.name: WorkflowPanel
observations: Left panel displaying 7 legal workflow phases
Progress gauge and phase selection
Status lights for each phase
Toggle switches for phase options

entities.name: DeliverablesPanel
observations: Center panel with tabbed content views
Evidence table with ag-Grid integration
Claims matrix visualization
Shot-by-shot document list

entities.name: LLMChatPanel
observations: Right panel with agent-based chat interface
7 specialized legal agents with status indicators
Quick action buttons for common tasks
Chat history with agent avatars

entities.name: EvidenceTableComponent
observations: ag-Grid based evidence table
Soviet-themed dark styling
Sortable/filterable columns
Integrates with backend evidence API

entities.name: ClaimsMatrixComponent
observations: Grid visualization of legal claims
Color-coded claim strength indicators
Interactive claim selection
Links claims to evidence

entities.name: ShotByShotListComponent
observations: Sequential document shot list
Timestamp and description display
Drag-and-drop reordering capability
Links to source documents

entities.name: PuppeteerTestSuite
observations: Comprehensive Puppeteer tests for Soviet Control Panel UI
Tests layout, components, interactions, keyboard shortcuts
Located at tests/test_soviet_control_panel.js
Includes visual regression and integration tests

entities.name: PhaseC02Integration
observations: Added missing Phase C02 Final Orchestration to PhasePipeline.jsx
Completes 7-phase workflow visualization with Maestro Bot agent
Includes court-ready documents, filing package, case summary outputs

entities.name: OrchestrationAPIEndpoints
observations: Added Phase C02 API endpoints to apiService.js
Includes startFinalOrchestration, getOrchestrationStatus, getFinalDeliverables
Integrated with LawyerFactoryAPI class for orchestration phase workflow

entities.name: EvidenceUploadIntegration
observations: Integrated EvidenceUpload component with Phase A01 workflow
Added unified storage API integration for evidence management
Implemented real-time upload progress and notifications

entities.name: RealTimeUpdateSystem
observations: Enhanced EvidenceTable.jsx with Socket.IO real-time updates
Added phase-specific evidence filtering and live refresh
Implemented live connection status indicators and notifications

entities.name: WorkflowStatePersistence
observations: Implemented comprehensive workflow state persistence in apiService.js
Added state recovery on application restart functionality
Supports both backend and localStorage state management

entities.name: ErrorRecoverySystem
observations: Added comprehensive error recovery strategies for different error types
Implemented retry mechanisms with exponential backoff
Added fallback provider switching capabilities

entities.name: LaunchScriptV4
observations: Enhanced launch-dev.sh v4.0.0 with comprehensive system integration
Automated environment setup, dependency management, health checks
Advanced port management, process tracking, graceful shutdown

entities.name: AutomatedUITestSuite
observations: Puppeteer-based UI testing suite for http://localhost:3000
11 automated tests: page load (3), grid layout (2), responsive (3), accessibility (2), performance (1)
Test results: 45% pass rate (5/11), identified grid framework integration gap
Located at tests/run-ui-tests.js with JSON results output

entities.name: GridFrameworkComponents
observations: Grid layout framework components exist but not integrated into current views
Components: GridContainer.jsx, NestedAccordion.jsx, ContextOverlay.jsx
Zero-scroll architecture not detected in DOM during testing
Requires integration verification and selector updates

entities.name: TestResultsOct2025
observations: React app renders successfully with 81 focusable elements, 104 ARIA attributes
Grid containers not found - integration gap between components and views
Page load time 8.4s exceeds 3s target (likely dev mode HMR overhead)
5 screenshots captured across mobile/tablet/desktop viewports
